title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: Update the task description to provide a more comprehensive breakdown of the tasks that need to be completed for this RFC. This includes functional and non-functional requirements, use cases, constraints, data models, security considerations, scalability and performance requirements, ethical implications, and potential integration with existing systems or technologies. Additionally, consider the user interface design, accessibility, and user experience aspects.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the HiveMindInterface, including the brain-computer interface, network infrastructure, and data management components.

title: Develop Brain-Computer Interface
description: Implement the brain-computer interface component that allows users to share thoughts and experiences.

title: Implement Network Infrastructure
description: Develop the network infrastructure that enables secure and efficient communication between users in the hive mind.

title: Develop Data Management System
description: Implement the data management system for storing and retrieving shared thoughts and experiences.

title: Create User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the HiveMindInterface, allowing users to join and participate in hive minds.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Develop and implement security measures to ensure the privacy and integrity of shared thoughts and experiences.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the HiveMindInterface project.

title: Create Test Suite
description: Develop a comprehensive test suite for the HiveMindInterface project, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create technical documentation for the HiveMindInterface project, including system architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides.
